blogs.title: Building Real-Time Lecture Streaming at Scale with Next.js and Node.js
blogs.description: How we architected Thapar Edutube to handle 10,000+ concurrent students. A deep dive into our tech stack choices, database optimizations, and lessons learned.

blogs.title: Vector Databases & RAG: Building AI-Powered Chat Interfaces
blogs.description: Implementing retrieval-augmented generation with Qdrant and LLMs. Learn how to make AI systems remember context and fetch relevant information in real-time.

blogs.title: Full-Stack Performance: Redis Caching Strategies for High-Traffic Apps
blogs.description: A practical guide to implementing Redis in production. From cache invalidation patterns to handling distributed cache scenarios at scale.

blogs.title: Designing Dashboard UIs with React 19 & Framer Motion: From Static to Interactive
blogs.description: Building responsive, animated dashboards without sacrificing performance. Tips on component architecture, animation patterns, and mobile-first design.

blogs.title: Docker & Deployment: Taking Your App from Local to Production
blogs.description: A step-by-step guide to containerizing applications and deploying them reliably. Covers Docker best practices, multi-stage builds, and CI/CD pipelines.
